text: Big Eyes is a 2014 American biographical drama movie directed by Tim Burton and produced by Burton and Scott Alexander and Larry Karaszewski. It is based on the careers of American artists Margaret and her husband Walter Keane. It is set in San Francisco, California during the 1950s. They are played by Amy Adams and Christoph Waltz. It also stars Krysten Ritter, Jason Schwartzman, Danny Huston, Jon Polito and Terence Stamp. The music was composed by Danny Elfman. It was released to very positive reviews on December 25, 2014. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:American biographical movies Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:2010s feminist movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:2010s biographical movies Category:2010s romantic drama movies Category:2014 drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American crime movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Canadian biographical movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Legal movies Category:Movies composed by Danny Elfman Category:Movies directed by Tim Burton Category:Movies set in Hawaii Category:Movies set in the 1960s
title: Big Eyes
